title: Use uploaded images in Pride Moments carousel

requirements.summary: Add the 5 uploaded Pride Moments images as frontend static assets under the public assets folder.
acceptanceCriteria: The files im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, and im1-5.jpg exist in the built frontend as static assets (e.g., under frontend/public/assets/).
All 5 images can be loaded directly via their asset URLs in the browser without 404 errors.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image file as a static asset so it is served by the frontend build at /assets/im1-3.jpg.
Add the uploaded image file as a static asset so it is served by the frontend build at /assets/im2-3.jpg.
Add the uploaded image file as a static asset so it is served by the frontend build at /assets/im1-4.jpg.
Add the uploaded image file as a static asset so it is served by the frontend build at /assets/im2-4.jpg.
Add the uploaded image file as a static asset so it is served by the frontend build at /assets/im1-5.jpg.

requirements.summary: Replace Pride Moments carousel image sources with the 5 uploaded asset URLs and keep meaningful English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/prideMoments.ts references exactly the 5 uploaded image filenames (im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, im1-5.jpg) in the Pride Moments event images array.
The Pride Moments section carousel displays 5 distinct slides corresponding to the 5 uploaded images.

file_operations.description: Update the Pride Moments event images array to reference exactly: /assets/im1-3.jpg, /assets/im2-3.jpg, /assets/im1-4.jpg, /assets/im2-4.jpg, /assets/im1-5.jpg, and set meaningful English alt text for each image (without changing other Pride Moments text beyond whatâ€™s needed for src/alt).

requirements.summary: Ensure the Pride Moments carousel remains fully manual with working prev/next and indicator navigation across all images.
acceptanceCriteria: Carousel does not automatically change slides over time or based on visibility.
Clicking Next cycles through all 5 images and wraps from the last image back to the first.
Clicking Previous cycles through all 5 images and wraps from the first image to the last.
Clicking an indicator dot navigates to the corresponding image index.
When there is more than one image, navigation controls (previous/next + indicators) are visible and functional.

file_operations.description: Harden the manual carousel behavior: ensure there is no timer/auto-advance logic, keep prev/next wrap-around, keep indicators enabled, and add safeguards so currentIndex stays within bounds when the images array changes (e.g., reset/clamp index). Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
